text:
Case New Holland | Burr Ridge, Illinois | Full-Time | Embedded Software Developer

Job descriptions are in the two links below. Basically, we have an opening for a Jr. level C/C++ programmer and a position for a more senior level C/C++ programmer.

Looking for experienced with Linux, Native Android/NDK, and an RTOS such as Green Hills uVelocity or Wind River VxWorks.

The work is in display systems used to control features of our agricultural machines.

https://www.recruitacommunity.com/srctcb/RTI.home?t=56260&r=...

https://www.recruitacommunity.com/srctcb/RTI.home?t=56260&r=...
